snippet: In an interview-slash-self-analysis at the Web site whedonesque.com, Joss Whedon, the director and screenwriter of "The Avengers," talked about his future plans and how the film's success has or has not changed his life.
abstract: In an interview-slash-self-analysis at the Web site whedonesque.com, Joss Whedon, the director and screenwriter of "The Avengers," talked about his future plans and how the film's success has or has not changed his life.

headline.main: After a Record-Breaking Weekend, 'Avengers' Director Joss Whedon Reflects
